desc: Designed by a Canadian air quality expert. KandyMask uses the top grade filtration materials that have been proven to have a 99% filtration efficiency by Nelson Labs Now every Canadian can protect themselves and others at the same time.

layout.text: Top Masks use The Right Filtration Materials. Why aren't you?

Meet the protective face mask with a >99% filtration efficiency.
Designed by Canadian filtration experts to combat airborne contaminants by combining the filtration materials from the highest filtration mask and the cost savings of a reusable mask with ultra soft microfibre layers.
